title: Hake with chanterelles and a Swiss chard stew
description: It's important to use Spanish paprika because its flavour is softer, which works well in this delicate stew.
ingredients: sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 red peppers, deseeded and finely sliced
750g/1lb 10oz Swiss chard, stalks roughly chopped and leaves shredded
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
